sqlQuery.name: SequenceAttrs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, eas.source_id, eas.length, eas.description AS product, eas.molecular_weight, ot.three_letter_abbrev AS abbreviation, ot.name AS taxon_name, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(collect(ec.ec_number) as apidb.varchartab)), ', ') FROM dots.AaSequenceEnzymeClass asec, sres.enzymeClass ec WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = asec.aa_sequence_id AND asec.enzyme_class_id = ec.enzyme_class_id GROUP by eas.secondary_identifier ) as ec_numbers, (SELECT apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(collect(da.accession) as apidb.varchartab)), ', ') FROM ApidbTuning.DomainAssignment da WHERE da.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id GROUP BY da.full_id ) as pfam_domains FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.orthomcltaxon ot WHERE substr(eas.secondary_identifier,1,4) = ot.three_letter_abbrev

sqlQuery.name: SequenceGroup
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT sa.full_id, sa.group_name, sa.url, CASE sa.core_peripheral WHEN 'C' THEN 'Core' WHEN 'P' THEN 'Peripheral' END AS core_peripheral, CASE WHEN sa.group_name LIKE 'OG%r%_%' THEN 0 ELSE sa.group_size END AS num_core, CASE WHEN sa.group_name LIKE 'OG%r%_%' THEN sa.group_size ELSE sa.peripheral_group_size-sa.group_size END AS num_peripheral, CASE WHEN sa.url is null THEN null ELSE sa.full_id END AS link_text FROM ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa

sqlQuery.name: SequenceSequence
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, eas.sequence FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas

sqlQuery.name: OldGroups
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, ref.primary_identifier AS group_name FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, Dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, Sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id AND seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id AND ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id AND dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id AND db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups'

sqlQuery.name: PFamDomains
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT da.full_id, da.accession, da.symbol, da.description, da.domain_index, (SELECT MAX(domain_index) FROM ApidbTuning.DomainAssignment) AS max_index, da.start_min, da.end_max, sa.length FROM ApidbTuning.DomainAssignment da, ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa WHERE da.full_id = sa.full_id ORDER BY da.full_id, da.start_min

sqlQuery.name: EcNumbers
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier as full_id, ec.ec_number, ec.description, 'http://enzyme.expasy.org/cgi-bin/enzyme/enzyme-search-ec?field1=' || ec.ec_number_1 || chr(38) || 'field2=' || ec.ec_number_2 || chr(38) || 'field3=' || ec.ec_number_3 || chr(38) || 'field4=' || ec.ec_number_4 as expasy_url FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, dots.AaSequenceEnzymeClass asec, sres.enzymeClass ec WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = asec.aa_sequence_id AND asec.enzyme_class_id = ec.enzyme_class_id

sqlQuery.name: Product
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, eas.description AS product, eas.secondary_identifier AS id_string FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas

sqlQuery.name: Taxon
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.secondary_identifier AS full_id, ot.three_letter_abbrev AS abbreviation, ot.name AS taxon FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.orthomcltaxon ot WHERE substr(eas.secondary_identifier,1,4) = ot.three_letter_abbrev

sqlQuery.name: OrthologGroupId
sqlQuery.sql: with sequences as (select full_id, group_name, aa_sequence_id from ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes) select s.full_id, s.group_name from sequences s where s.group_name is not null union select s.full_id, ref.primary_identifier AS group_name from sequences s, dots.AaSequenceDbRef seqref, Sres.DbRef ref, sres.ExternalDatabase db, Sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease dbr where s.aa_sequence_id = seqref.aa_sequence_id and seqref.db_ref_id = ref.db_ref_id and ref.external_database_release_id = dbr.external_database_release_id and dbr.external_database_id = db.external_database_id and db.name = 'OrthoMCL Old Groups'
